channel.title: AWS .NET CDK Infra-as-Code on ASP.NET Modernization Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in AWS .NET CDK Infra-as-Code on ASP.NET Modernization Workshop

item.title: Overview
item.description: Welcome to the .NET AWS CDK module of the workshop! “CDK” stands for Cloud Development Kit. Workshop Goals The goal of this lab is to guide participants through adding support for MySQL database to both ASP.NET application codebase, and to the existing infra-as-code C# CDK projects defining cloud CI/CD pipeline and cloud application deployment environment. This workshop skips the “Hello, World” CDK project creation, and instead focuses on somewhat more in-depth capabilities of the CDK, showing higher-fidelity code samples implementing closer-to-real-life scenarios.
